---

description: "This route allows you to fetch the audit logs of a specific integration in your Port organization.<br/><br/>To learn more about integrations, check out the [documentation](https://docs.port.io/build-your-software-catalog/sync-data-to-catalog/)."

---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get an integration's audit logs"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/integration/{identifier}/logs"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This route allows you to fetch the audit logs of a specific integration in your Port organization.<br/><br/>To learn more about integrations, check out the [documentation](https://docs.port.io/build-your-software-catalog/sync-data-to-catalog/).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"schema":{"type":"number","default":100,"minimum":0,"maximum":300,"nullable":false},"in":"query","name":"limit","description":"The number of logs to fetch per page.<br/>","required":false},{"schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"query","name":"timestamp","description":"The date of time from which to fetch the logs, in `ISO format IE 2022-04-23T18:25:43.511Z`.<br/>","required":false},{"schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"query","name":"log_id","description":"The identifier of the log.<br/>","required":false},{"schema":{"type":"string","enum":["up","down"]},"in":"query","name":"direction","description":"Determines whether to fetch logs before or after the specified timestamp.<br/>","required":false},{"schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","name":"identifier","description":"The installation id of the integration.<br/>","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Default Response"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
